events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving a collision with another vehicle. They are requesting to file an official claim for damages.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after verifying the description and keywords related to vehicle collision and damages.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to provide personalized assistance and guide the claimant through the process.
The claim has been formally acknowledged, and the customer was notified that their case is now under review by the claims department.
We have requested the customer to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and any repair estimates from the auto shop.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including pictures of the damage and an official police report for review.
The internal investigation has begun with the assigned claim adjuster reviewing all submitted information and contacting involved parties.
The investigation into the vehicle accident claim is complete. All evidence and reports have been analysed thoroughly.
We have proposed a settlement offer to the customer based on estimated repair costs and coverage terms outlined in their policy.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the communication and support so far.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims department, confirming that the settlement amount is in line with policy coverage.
Payment for the approved claim settlement was issued to the customer’s bank account today as per the agreed terms.
The claim file has been closed following confirmation of the payment and the customer’s acceptance of the settlement.
All documents and correspondences related to the claim have been archived for record-keeping and future reference if necessary.
